name: Nino - Fear of Light and Shadow
name_original: Nino - Fear of Light and Shadow
description:
A classic theme with Nino fun!, an addictive and challenging game that requires patience to achieve maximum pass through worlds full of obstacles, extreme natural forces and enigmantes magic items that will power or complexity to your route!

Game features:

Complexity
Our mission is to balance the difficulty with the ability to win, but this is not easy, you understand the operation cost of each enigmatic object and the consequences that everyone will.

NATURAL FORCES
We know it is difficult to predict the times today but Nino is worse, you will face storms, tornadoes, rain, snow, earthquakes and much more plowing your way almost impossible to overcome.
